product_name: GoLite TraveLite Upright Wheeled Luggage - 25" - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Sometimes your adventures require more gear than can be stored in the overhead bin. The GoLite TraveLite Upright 25" Wheeled Luggage holds all you need, and can take a beating in the carousel.
short_description: Sometimes your adventures require more gear than can be stored in the overhead bin. The GoLite TraveLite Upright 25" Wheeled Luggage holds all you need, and can take a beating in the carousel.
